term.title: in-out isomerism

item.text: Isomerism found in bicyclic systems having long enough bridges to allow the bridgehead exocyclic bond or lone pair of electrons to point either inside the structure or outside. [image: Not defined] [image: Not defined]

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2210 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
